entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
